GENERAL_SAFETY.content: Good housekeeping is maintained and work environment is adequately ventilated and illuminated
Non-load bearing surfaces or platforms are secured with guardrails and labelled with ‘’Danger - Do not Step” warning signs

No slips, trips and falls hazards such as:
- Potholes on the ground
- No uneven ground 
- Staircase step inconsistency 
- Ground protrusions 
- No slippery floor
No physical hazards:\n- Overhead hazards (dangling ceiling boards, fixtures and other objects)\n- Protrusions of structure and objects posing struck against hazards
Worksite barricaded with warning or safety signs available and visible in the work area
No water ponding or stagnant water found (mosquito breeding)

MACHINERY.content: Moving parts of machinery provided with protective guards or covers

WORKING_AT_HEIGHT.content: Fall prevention measures such as guard rails, travel restraint or fall arrestors are used when there are risks of falling a distance of ≥ 2 metre

Scaffold complies with the following:
- Erected on stable ground
- Toeboards provided
- Guard rails provided
- Proper means of access (e.g. cat ladder)
- Safe for use tag prominently displayed
- Working platforms secured
- No missing working platform
Mobile elevated working platform (MEWP) operated by competent person and authorized person

LIFTING.content: Lifting equipment with valid certificates and in good condition
Lifting plan available and with competent lifting crew (lifting supervisor, rigger, signalmen)
Lifting operations measures are implemented (stable ground, outrigger fully extended, 3-3-3 pre-checks for lifting, etc)

FIRE_SAFETY.content:
Area free from fire hazards:
- no storage of discarded combustible materials such as cardboard/documents
- no obstruction to fireman’s access and emergency fire exits
- fire fighting system and equipment are in good condition

FORKLIFT.content:
The forklift is parked appropriately when not in use:
- forks on the floor
- key removed from ignition
- not obstructing other services or activities / access

MATERIAL_STORAGE.content: Material Storage:\n- Racks and pallets are in good condition and stable\n- Materials stored at height are secured
